title: U.S. Reopening of Borders to International Travelers: What to Know About the Rules
sub_head: Children under 18 are exempt from vaccination requirements, and unvaccinated travelers will face stricter testing protocols
body:
International travelers who are fully vaccinated and show proof of vaccination can travel to the U.S. beginning Nov. 8.
Biden administration officials on Monday released more information on pre-departure testing for both international and returning U.S. travelers, as well as exemptions for children under 18.
